page.title: 04MONTFORD BRIDGE - NOISE
page.content:
Noise pollution is regarded as a major problem by many of the locals.
The heavy{road traffic}which passes through the area on the A5 creates a lot of noise for much of the day. Discussions are presently under way on the construction of a new Shrewsbury by_pass which should help to remedy this problem. The new road is planned to divert the majority of the traffic 600 metres from Montford Bridge.
Light{aircraft}used by parachutists from the nearby Forton airfield create a lot of noise. This has caused considerable conflict with the local people. Further details on pages 13 - 15.
